name: Torque: Simulation Begins
description: TORQUE is a 2 Player online-coop only game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: AMD FX 6300 Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500X Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
